chapter.title: Tuning Kuali Rice ${project.version}
chapter.para: Performance tuning is an art form in and of itself, and tuning Kuali Rice is no exception. Here are some items we've found that may help with your tuning issues. Additionally, we are collecting performance tuning information in the Kuali Rice wiki at https://wiki.kuali.org/x/2hOeEg.
